notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
desc: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
